row.column: MTM flows that, among other things, require different transfer available date logic
A value of 'True' designates this fund to SFR-8A column.
A value of 'True' designates this fund to SFR-8B column.
A value of 'False' designates this fund to SFR-8C column.
'true' signifies a dummy security used for custodial segregation
A value of 'True' designates this fund to SFR-8A column.
A value of 'True' designates this fund to SFR-8B column.
A value of 'False' designates this fund to SFR-8C column.
Inventory movement types to be considered when computing the SFR 7B
Inventory movement types to be considered when computing the SFR 7C
Book types to be considered when computing the SFR 7C
Statuses to ignore when processing SOD Cover Dist margin calls
Access Permissions function for creating or modifying an onboarding template
Access Permissions function for deleting an onboarding template
Access Permissions function to create objects
Access Permissions function for authorizing ClientOnboardingData objects
Name of the MCC additional fields to propagare to Margin Call trades
Comma Separated list of transfer types explicit to this Margin Call Contract. If the list is empty, this contract will accept any transfer not listed on another of this LE's VM Margin Call Contract
A value of 'True' designates this MCC as contributing to the Separate Settlements section of the Client Statement. Any other value will associate the MCC with the Financial Summary section
Governs how margin numbers are imported, either in their requirement ccy, or the native one
Add the names of the Scheduled Tasks that should make use of the parallel download option, if available (e.g.: CLEARING_IMPORT_MARKET_DATA)
Enriches the CVR_WORKSHEET message with information to be sent to the CCP
Processes an incoming collateral allocation message and matches it to an existing CVR_WORKSHEET one
Translates MT569 SWIFT message to margin call security trades
Formats the CFTC report and prepares the message for the SenderEngine
Formats the Tabular statement and prepares the message for the SenderEngine
Added for demo/testing purposes. Does nothing but to log invocations
Collection of Spring resource locations to configure the Clearing Statement
Set it to true to activate some basic profiling characteristics. If set to false, or to multiple values, or empty, it's taken as false
Enrich ETD cleared trade with keywords derived from other trade information
Sanity check on ETD cleared trades product static data
Allows the default ETD position spec name to be overriden. Its default name is 'default'
Default client account name or id to use when missing, or invalid, applicable only to ProcessingOrgs
Number of threads to generate client statements. Defaults to 20
Market Identifier Code, used for UTI generation
If true, purge old margin data when inserting new
Number of natural days of margin data to keep when purging, counting from today
Ordered list of locations where to obtain external data for Clearing (only ETD for the moment)
Path to the local filesystem cache of external data. This location will mirror, in terms of structure, the ones listed in Clearing.ExternalData.locations
Enriches and formats the CFTC_ETD_REPORT message
Boolean indicating if the trade is a covered one, for IM calculation purposes
CounterParty LE attribute storing an account id/name
OCR Volume Threshold to report the accounts that breach this threshold
Calypso mapping for uploader Interface types
instructs the Clearing Dashboard to load more contract attributes, aside from the OOTB ones
